Bushwhack.card_desc: [Quick Switch] Swapping to your Pistol grants {scale=10|10}% Lifesteal for 3s.

Cooled Mags.card_desc: [Quick Switch] Every 1.5s your inactive Weapon generates {scale=2|2} Ammo.

Crack Shot.card_desc: [Weapon] Your Side Arm deals 20% more damage to targets that you have hit with your Talon Rifle within the last 4s.

Dexterous.card_desc: [Quick Switch] Reduce the time to swap to your Side Arm by {scale=10|10}%

Escape Plan.card_desc: [Stealth] Entering stealth below 65% health heals you for {scale=100|100} health.

Flare XL.card_desc: [Flare] Increase the Reveal range of Flare by {scale=10|10}%

Infused Crystals.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase the ammo count of both of your weapons by {scale=2|2}.

Nocturnal.card_desc: [Stealth] Your Stealth bar is consumed 50% slower.

Relentless.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce the movement speed penalty of Scope by {scale=20|20}%

Resourceful.card_desc: [Quick Switch] Every second your rifle is out, the cooldown of Flare is reduced by {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Roost.card_desc: [Scope] Hits with Talon Rifle grant {scale=1|1}% ultimate charge.

Stalker.card_desc: [Stealth]  Increase your Reload Speed by {scale=10|10}% while Stealth is active.

Tactical Retreat.card_desc: [Stealth] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 2s when entering stealth.

Trigger Control.card_desc: [Weapon] Reduce maximum Side Arm inaccuracy by {scale=8|8}%

Unauthorized Use.card_desc: [Flare] Flare deals 300% more Damage, has increased Projectile Speed, and its Cooldown is reduced by 10s, but no longer reveals.

Abzugkontrolle.card_desc: [Waffe] Reduziert die maximale Ungenauigkeit deiner Seitenwaffe um {scale=8|8}%.

Dickicht.card_desc: [Schneller Wechsel] Wechselst du zu deiner Seitenwaffe, erhältst du 3s lang {scale=10|10}% Lebensraub.

Findig.card_desc: [Schneller Wechsel] Trägst du dein Gewehr, wird die Abklingzeit von Leuchtrakete pro Sekunde um {scale=0.2|0.2}s reduziert.

Fingerfertig.card_desc: [Schneller Wechsel] Reduziert die Wechselzeit zur Seitenwaffe um {scale=10|10}%.

Fluchtplan.card_desc: [Tarnung] Unter 65% Gesundheit wirst du bei Aktivierung von Tarnung {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Gek\u00fchlte Magazine.card_desc: [Schneller Wechsel] Deine inaktive Waffe erzeugt alle 1,5s {scale=2|2} Munition.

Gr\u00e4ulich.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Hochspannend.card_desc: [Waffe] Reduziert den Rückstoß deiner Seitenwaffe um {scale=6|6}%.

Infundierte Kristalle.card_desc: [Waffe] Erhöht die Magazinkapazität deiner beiden Waffen um {scale=2|2}.

Pirschj\u00e4ger.card_desc: [Tarnung] Erhöht während Tarnung dein Nachladetempo um {scale=10|10}%.

Rast.card_desc: [Sucher] Treffer mit dem Klauengewehr laden die Überkraft um {scale=1|1}% auf.

Taktischer R\u00fcckzug.card_desc: [Tarnung] Die Aktivierung von Tarnung erhöht dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

\u00dcberbrennung.card_desc: [Leuchtrakete] Erhöht die Dauer von Leuchtrakete um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Unbarmherzig.card_desc: [Waffe] Reduziert die Verlangsamung durch Sucher um {scale=20|20}%.

Unerlaubte Nutzung.card_desc: [Leuchtrakete] Erhöht den Schaden von Leuchtrakete um 300% und die Projektilgeschwindigkeit und reduziert zudem die Abklingzeit um 10s. Offenbart dafür keine Gegner mehr.

XL-Leuchtrakete.card_desc: [Leuchtrakete] Erhöht die Offenbarungsreichweite von Leuchtrakete um {scale=10|10}%.

Zielsch\u00fctze.card_desc: [Waffe] Deine Seitenwaffe fügt Zielen, die du innerhalb der letzten 4s mit deinem Klauengewehr getroffen hast, 20% mehr Schaden zu.

Acharn\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] La pénalité de vitesse avec Lunette est réduite de {scale=20|20}%.

Br\u00fblure intense.card_desc: [Fusée éclairante] Fusée éclairante dure {scale=0.6|0.6}s de plus.

Chargeurs refroidis.card_desc: [Alternance] Toutes les 1,5s, votre arme inactive regagne {scale=2|2} munitions.

Cristaux infus\u00e9s.card_desc: [Arme] Vous avez {scale=2|2} munitions de plus dans vos deux armes.

Demande d'extraction.card_desc: [Camouflage] Quand vous avez moins de 65% de PV, activer Camouflage vous rend {scale=100|100} PV.

Dext\u00e9rit\u00e9.card_desc: [Alternance] La vitesse à laquelle vous dégainez votre pistolet augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Fus\u00e9e XL.card_desc: [Fusée éclairante] La portée de détection de Fusée éclairante augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

G\u00e2chette rapide.card_desc: [Arme] Votre pistolet inflige 20% de dégâts supplémentaires aux cibles touchées par votre fusil Talon dans les 4s qui précèdent.

Gu\u00e9rillero.card_desc: [Camouflage] Chaque élimination vous redonne {scale=15|15} de ressource de camouflage.

Nocturne.card_desc: [Camouflage] Vous consommez moitié moins de ressource de camouflage.

Perchoir.card_desc: [Lunette] Réussir un tir en visant donne {scale=1|1}% de charge d'ultime.

Pisteur.card_desc: [Camouflage] Quand vous êtes camouflé, votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Plein de ressources.card_desc: [Alternance] Chaque seconde, tant que votre fusil est dégainé, le temps de recharge de Fusée éclairante diminue de {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Prise ferme.card_desc: [Arme] Le recul de votre pistolet diminue de {scale=6|6}%.

Repli strat\u00e9gique.card_desc: [Camouflage] Pendant 2s après l'activation de Camouflage, votre vitesse augmente de {scale=10|10}%.

Stabilit\u00e9.card_desc: [Arme] L'imprécision maximale de votre pistolet diminue de {scale=8|8}%.

Traquenard.card_desc: [Alternance] Pendant 3s après avoir dégainé votre pistolet, vous avez {scale=10|10}% de drain de vie.

Utilisation non conforme.card_desc: [Fusée éclairante] Fusée éclairante inflige 300% de dégâts de plus et se recharge 10s plus vite, la vitesse de son projectile augmente, mais elle ne révèle plus.

\u4e0d\u5c48\u4e0d\u6320.card_desc: [高倍瞄准镜] 减少开镜状态下的移动速度衰减{scale=20|20}%

\u4e1b\u6797\u4f0f\u51fb.card_desc: [快速切换] 切换至手枪的3秒内会获得{scale=10|10}%生命偷取

\u5145\u80fd\u6c34\u6676.card_desc: [武器] 两种武器的弹药数量增加{scale=2|2}发

\u51b7\u5374\u5f39\u5939.card_desc: [快速切换] 每过1.5秒，你未激活的武器获得{scale=2|2} 颗弹药

\u591c\u884c\u8005.card_desc: [潜行] 潜行能量槽消耗减少50%

\u5927\u53f7\u7167\u660e\u5f39.card_desc: [照明弹] 照明弹的显形范围增加{scale=10|10}%

\u5feb\u67aa\u624b.card_desc: [武器]被狙击枪命中的目标在4秒内受到手枪的伤害提高20%。

\u6218\u7565\u64a4\u9000.card_desc: [潜行] 进入潜行状态的2秒内增加{scale=10|10}%的移动速度

\u6273\u673a\u63a7\u5236.card_desc: [武器] 副武器的散射效果降低{scale=8|8}%

\u6816\u606f.card_desc: [高倍瞄准镜] 开镜状态下静止不动时，减少{scale=6|6}%潜行能量的消耗

\u6e38\u51fb\u6218\u672f.card_desc: [潜行] 消灭敌人会获取{scale=15|15}点潜行能量

\u6ee5\u7528\u519b\u706b.card_desc: [照明弹] 照明弹的弹道速度增加100，伤害增加300%，冷却时间减少10秒

\u7075\u5de7.card_desc: [快速切换] 切换至副武器的时间减少{scale=20|20}%

\u767d\u6307\u5173\u8282.card_desc: [武器] 副武器后坐力减少{scale=6|6}%

\u8fc7\u5ea6\u71c3\u70e7.card_desc: [照明弹] 照明弹的显形持续时间增加{scale=0.6|0.6}秒

\u8ffd\u8e2a\u8005.card_desc: [潜行] 潜行状态下武器装填速度增加{scale=10|10}%

\u9003\u8131\u8ba1\u5212.card_desc: [潜行] 血量低于65%时进入潜行会恢复{scale=100|100}点生命

\u968f\u673a\u5e94\u53d8.card_desc: [快速切换] 当前使用狙击枪时，每秒照明弹冷却减少{scale=0.2|0.2}秒

Asechador.card_desc: [Sigilo] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=10|10}% mientras Sigilo está activo.

Aterrador.card_desc: [Arma] Reduce el retroimpacto del Arma secundaria un {scale=6|6}%.

Bengala XL.card_desc: [Bengala] Aumenta el alcance de revelación de Bengala en {scale=10|10}%.

Control del gatillo.card_desc: [Arma] Reduce la inexactitud del Arma secundaria un {scale=8|8}%.

Cristales infundidos.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta la cantidad de munición de tus dos armas en {scale=2|2}.

Diestro.card_desc: [Dinamismo] Reduce el tiempo de intercambio de tu arma secundaria un {scale=10|10}%.

Incesante.card_desc: [Arma] Reduce la sanción de velocidad de movimiento de Mira un {scale=20|20}%

Ingenioso.card_desc: [Cambio rápido] Cada segundo que empuñes tu rifle, se reduce la recarga de Bengala en {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Mags recargadas.card_desc: [Cambio rápido] Recuperas {scale=2|2} de munición cada 1,5s para el arma que no esté activa.

Matorral.card_desc: [Cambio rápido] Cambiar a tu pistola te otorga {scale=10|10}% de robo de vida durante 3s.

Nocturno.card_desc: [Sigilo] El medidor de sigilo se consume un 50% más lento.

Percha.card_desc: [Mira] Alcanzar a enemigos con Rifle de garras recarga la habilidad definitiva un {scale=1|1}%.

Plan de escape.card_desc: [Sigilo] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS al entrar en Sigilo con menos de 65% de salud.

Retracci\u00f3n t\u00e1ctica.card_desc: [Sigilo] Ganas un {scale=10|10}% de velocidad de movimiento durante 2s cuando entras en sigilo.

T\u00e1cticas guerrilleras.card_desc: [Sigilo] Las eliminaciones otorgan {scale=15|15} recursos de Sigilo.

Tirador experto.card_desc: [Arma] Tu arma secundaria inflige un 20% adicional de daño a objetivos alcanzados con Rifle de garra en un lapso de 4s.

Uso No Autorizado.card_desc: [Bengala] Bengala inflige un 300% más de daño, tiene una velocidad de proyectil aumentada y se reduce su recarga en 10s, pero ya no revela.

Boa Articula\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz o coice da pistola de apoio em {scale=6|6}%.

Cartuchos Inativos.card_desc: [Troca Rápida] Cada 1,5s que sua arma fica inativa ela gera {scale=2|2} de munição.

Cheio de Destreza.card_desc: [Troca Rápida] Reduz em {scale=10|10}% o tempo que leva para trocar entre as armas.

Cheio de Recursos.card_desc: [Troca Rápida] A cada segundo que seu rifle fica inativo, o tempo de carregamento do Sinalizador é reduzido em {scale=0.2|0.2}s.

Controle do Gatilho.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz a falta de precisão máxima da pistola de apoio em {scale=8|8}%.

Cristais Infundidos.card_desc: [Arma] Aumenta a quantidade de munição de ambas as suas armas em {scale=2|2}.

Embrenhado.card_desc: [Troca Rápida] Trocar para a Pistola te dá {scale=10|10}% de roubo de vida por 3s.

Incans\u00e1vel.card_desc: [Arma] Reduz em {scale=20|20}% a penalidade causada pela Luneta à velocidade de movimento.

Not\u00edvago.card_desc: [Furtividade] Sua barra de Furtividade é consumida 50% mais devagar.

Perseguidor.card_desc: [Furtividade] Você recarrega a arma {scale=10|10}% mais rápido enquanto Furtividade estiver ativa.

Plano de Fuga.card_desc: [Furtividade] Entrar em Furtividade com vida abaixo de 65%, cura você em {scale=100|100} de vida.

Puleiro.card_desc: [Luneta] Cada acerto com o Rifle Tático carrega {scale=1|1}% da sua suprema.

Retirada T\u00e1tica.card_desc: Ganha {scale=10|10}% mais velocidade de movimento durante 2s ao entrar em Furtividade.

Sinalizador GG.card_desc: [Sinalizador] Aumenta a área revelada pelo Sinalizador em {scale=10|10}%.

T\u00e1ticas de Guerrilha.card_desc: [Furtividade] Eliminações concedem mais {scale=15|15} de recurso para Furtividade.

Tiro de Ataque.card_desc: [Arma] Sua pistola de apoio causa 20% mais dano em alvos que você já tenha acertado com o Rifle Tático nos últimos 4s.

Uso N\u00e3o Autorizado.card_desc: [Sinalizador] O Sinalizador causa 300% mais dano, a velocidade do projétil é maior e tem o intervalo reduzido em 10s, mas não revela mais inimigos.

\u0412\u0441\u043f\u044b\u0448\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Вспышка] Радиус обнаружения цели Вспышкой увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0416\u0435\u043b\u0435\u0437\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Отдача при стрельбе из пистолета уменьшается на {scale=6|6}%.

\u0417\u0430\u043f\u0430\u0441\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Быстрый выбор] Каждые 1,5 с. неактивное оружие генерирует {scale=2|2} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041c\u0435\u0442\u043a\u0438\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Пистолет наносит на 20% больше урона целям, которые вы уже поразили из винтовки за последние 4 с.

\u041d\u0430\u043b\u0435\u0442.card_desc: [Быстрый выбор] Вы получаете {scale=10|10}% вампиризма на 3 с. при переключении на пистолет.

\u041d\u0430\u0441\u0435\u0441\u0442.card_desc: [Прицел] Попадания из винтовки "Коготь" заряжают суперудар на {scale=1|1}%.

\u041d\u0430\u0445\u043e\u0434\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Быстрый выбор] Каждая секунда использования винтовки сокращает перезарядку Вспышки на {scale=0.2|0.2} с.

\u041d\u0435\u043f\u0440\u0435\u043a\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Во время использования Прицела штраф к скорости передвижения уменьшается на {scale=20|20}%.

\u041d\u0421\u0414.card_desc: [Вспышка] Скорость снаряда Вспышки увеличивается, и она наносит на 300% больше урона. Перезарядка Вспышки сокращается на 10 с., но она больше не раскрывает местоположение врагов.

\u041f\u043b\u0430\u043d \u043f\u043e\u0.card_desc: [Скрытность] Переход в режим скрытности при уровне здоровья ниже 65% исцеляет вас на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u043d\u0438\u0437\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Боезапас всего вашего оружия увеличивается на {scale=2|2}.

\u0421\u043d\u043e\u0440\u043e\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Быстрый выбор] Вы переключаетесь на пистолет на {scale=10|10}% быстрее.

\u0421\u0442\u0430\u043b\u043a\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Скрытность] Скорость перезарядки в режиме скрытности увеличивается на {scale=10|10}%.

\u0422\u0430\u043a\u0442\u0438\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Скрытность] Скорость передвижения при переходе в режим скрытности увеличивается на {scale=10|10}% на 2 с.

Ch\u0142odne magazynki.card_desc: [Szybka zamiana] Twoja nieaktywna broń generuje {scale=2|2} szt. amunicji co 1,5 s.

Instynkt buszu.card_desc: [Szybka zamiana] Wydobycie pistoletu zapewnia {scale=10|10}% kradzieży życia na 3 s.

Kontrola spustu.card_desc: [Broń] Zmniejsza o {scale=8|8}% maks. niecelność broni bocznej.

Kryszta\u0142y weny.card_desc: [Broń] Zwiększa limit amunicji dla obu broni o {scale=2|2} szt.

Nieuprawnione u\u017cycie.card_desc: [Flara] Flara zadaje o 300% obrażeń więcej, szybkość jej pocisków zostaje zwiększona, a czas odnowienia zostaje skrócony o 10 s, ale nie ujawnia już ukrytych wrogów.

Niewzruszony.card_desc: [Broń] Zmniejsza karę do szybkości ruchu dla Lunety o {scale=20|20}%.

Nocne \u017cycie.card_desc: [Kamuflaż] Pasek Kamuflażu kurczy się o 50% wolniej.

Odwr\u00f3t taktyczny.card_desc: [Kamuflaż] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 2 s podczas Kamuflażu.

Partyzantka.card_desc: [Kamuflaż] Eliminacje zwiększają potencjał Kamuflażu o {scale=15|15} pkt.

Plan ucieczki.card_desc: [Kamuflaż] Wejście w tryb Kamuflażu poniżej 65% PZ przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ.

Pomys\u0142owo\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Szybka zamiana] Skraca czas odnowienia Flary o {scale=0.2|0.2} s co 1 s, gdy karabin jest używany.

Prze\u015bladowca.card_desc: [Kamuflaż] Zwiększa o {scale=10|10}% szybkość przeładowania podczas Kamuflażu.

Rewolwerowiec.card_desc: [Szybka zamiana] Skraca czas wydobycia broni bocznej o {scale=10|10}%.

Sokoli wzrok.card_desc: [Broń] Broń boczna zadaje 20% więcej obrażeń celom trafionym wcześniej karabinem w ciągu ostatnich 4 s.

Ek Yak\u0131t.card_desc: [İşaret Fişeği] İşaret Fişeği {scale=0.6|0.6} sn daha uzun sürer.

Eli \u00c7abuk.card_desc: [Hızlı Değiştirme] Yedek Silah'ına geçiş süresini %{scale=10|10} azalt.

Gerilla Takti\u011fi.card_desc: [Gizlenme] Saf Dışı Bırakmalar {scale=15|15} Gizlenme Kaynağı verir.

G\u00fc\u00e7 Dolu Kristaller.card_desc: [Silah] Her iki silahının da cephane sayısını {scale=2|2} artır.

\u0130\u015f Bilen.card_desc: [Hızlı Değiştirme] Tüfeğinin elinde olduğu her saniye, İşaret Fişeği'nin Bekleme Süresi {scale=0.2|0.2} sn azalır.

\u0130\u015faret Fi\u015fe\u011fi XL.card_desc: [İşaret Fişeği] İşaret Fişeği'nin Açığa Çıkarma menzilini %{scale=10|10} artır.

Keskin Ni\u015fanc\u0131.card_desc: [Silah] Son 4 saniyede Pusucu Tüfeği ile vurduğun hedeflere Yedek Silahınla %20 daha fazla hasar verirsin.

Pusuda.card_desc: [Hızlı Değiştirme] Tabancanı almak 3 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Can Çalma verir.

So\u011futmal\u0131 \u015earj\u00f6r.card_desc: [Hızlı Değiştirme] Etkin olmayan silahın her 1,5 saniyede {scale=2|2} Cephane üretir.

Takip\u00e7i.card_desc: [Gizlenme] Gizlenme etkinken Yeniden Doldurma Hızını %{scale=10|10} artır.

Taktik \u00c7ekilme.card_desc: [Gizlenme] Gizlenmeye girerken 2 sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} Hareket Hızı kazan.

Tetik Kontrol\u00fc.card_desc: [Silah] Maksimum Yedek Silah doğruluktan sapmasını %{scale=8|8} azalt.

T\u00fcneme.card_desc: [Dürbün] Pusucu Tüfeği ile yapılan vuruşlar ultiyi %{scale=1|1} doldurur.

Yetkisiz Kullan\u0131m.card_desc: [İşaret Fişeği] İşaret Fişeği %300 daha fazla Hasar verir, Atış Hızı artar ve Bekleme Süresi 10 sn azalır ancak açığa çıkarmaz.
